rulesStrings.li: physical_description_root->This suit's [single_piece] has an inscribed [depiction] of [image]. [desc_sentence_group]
physical_description_root->On this suit's [single_piece] is a [depiction] of [image]. [desc_sentence_group]
physical_description_root->This suit's [multiple_pieces] share an inscription that [depicts] [image]. [desc_sentence_group]
physical_description_root->This suit's [multiple_pieces] both bear a [depiction] of [image]. [desc_sentence_group]
